ISSUE.TITLE: Edits in the admin product price tier modal are not updated back in the product price tier grid.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.2 beta Please note that this issue is dependent on issue [3765](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/3765) being fixed first. Please check to see if pull request [3785](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/pull/3785) has been merged. Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. In product administration, select a product and add a new product tier. 2. Click the edit button to open the edit modal (if the above issue has not been fixed then this will not work). 3. Modify the modal quantity or price. 4. Click Save. Observe that the edits made in the modal are not refreshed in the grid (you have to refresh the browser window).
